entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:24 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -26.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 08:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -26.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -30.1°C
Wind: NNW 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
